review: Very friendly. Doctor explains everything so patiently *** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ******** Well equipped clinic and good suggestion of medicines

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
3 root canals 3 crown and the odd dental issues every now and then…
This is how my association with Dr Priya began. I have always found Dr Priya to be a very caring dentist, taking all her time to listen to the problem, explaining the cause and her course of treatment. 
It has been over 4 years since my 1st crown was implanted followed by a couple more. All of them have been very durable and haven’t caused any problems till now. And not to forget, hygiene is given paramount importance in her clinic.
From a patient to a Friend is how this has translated over these years.
Continue doing the good work, Dr Priya.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Surgical Tooth Extraction,Dental Implant Fixing,Artificial Teeth,
review:
I would never recommend her to anyone ever.  Only bcoz she is extremely rude.
I went to doctor for a broken tooth. First of all there is a hygiene issue. Because everyone visiting the clinic has to pass through the area where she operates and then go to waiting room. Clinic is under basement with extremely less ventilation. **** ** *** ******* **** ***** ********* **** ******** ** **** ***** *** **** *** *********** ********* she is super rude while explaining about extraction. She extracted the tooth which could been saved, *** *** **** **** *** *** **** ** **. When she suggested about extraction, trusting her I went ahead with it. Later on i had to visit my hometown , so I got implant done from there. When I came back to Bangalore. I booked an appointment with her again to get my stiches off. She immediately called me and asked me to cancel my appointment with her. She was so bitter that I got my implant already done that she told she will not treat me as even her helpers don’t remove stiches. She was very rude *** ****** *** ***** ** ***
reply_text: This foes not sound like my clinic at all. Are u by any chance mixed up with some other clinic????

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Priya is fine Doctor but then i m so satisfied with the service. We went to see her yesterday at 12 pm and she checked my father(patient). After examining she informed that treatment to be followed which all went well. She suggested to consult physician before extraction of the wisdom tooth. Agreed. We were finding it difficult to find the doctor address so we reached out to Practo to check on this and this was not my complaint. Today again we went to her with the physician report in the afternoon at 12 which was given to us 4 days back by Lal pathlab which we got done for the medical insurance and I asked her if she can check the same on mail and she told she don’t hv any issue in checking that but then she requested us to come at 4 pm as she was busy with patients. 
We went to see her at 4pm again and then she denied to check the report and we dont kn why.she 
also asked me why i complained abt her to practo which i feel is nt the good way of interacting with patients and she asked me to contact practo and talk about this. She denied to check the reports which is fine bt then she cud hv told us the same in the afternoon. We had to spedn the timw uselessly so not the good experience with her
reply_text: Patient does not reside in Bangalore.Patient brought in older reports . Was not ready to see a physician locally to get recent reports .HIGH RISK to treat empirically. Not prepared to take such a risk in the days of CORONAVIRUS and COVID diseases. We are doctors we know safety.  we are most concerned . WE CAnnot be forced to take unseen risks

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr. Priya for scaling. She was very quick and it did not hurt at all. 

However, I wasn’t satisfied with the treatment.

1. I had an appointment and I reached 10 minutes earlier than my allocated time. She asked me to come the next day. I’d appreciate if the cancellation was informed in prior. 

2. I could still find plaque in my teeth after scaling. I shared my concerns with Dr. Priya thrice and she begin to get irritated towards the end and sent me off saying it was cleaned perfectly. I’m not a doctor to argue with one. So I consulted another dentist for a second opinion. *** ****** ****** ********* **** ***** *** ***** ****** ***** ***

I’m sorry to say this, I don’t think it was professional of you to charge a patient, cancel appointments without notice and not do a complete job even after insisting. Why give a mirror to a patient and ask if everything is ok? 

I wouldn’t recommend anyone to go there.
reply_text: We always do are very best. Accommodate patients who need additional visits despite the present appointments. If we have fallen short even in case of a lot of efforts put. We are ready to see u again. This is our commitment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Unexpected!!!Visited her, since my Wisdom tooth had been aching for a month. She did one Xray to secure 300 bucks and then again suggested a full mouth xray  from a specificdiagnostic center and asked me to mention her name there. Now the final show starts, after seeing the Xray she sent the XRay to another specialist and made sure I do not hear their conversation and finally told me it would take 6800 rs to extract it.After hearing the cost my pain did feel numb for few minutes. I decided to consult with other doctors *** ******* *** ** **** ** **** ** **** *** ** *** ****** ***** ******* ** ********
reply_text: If a patient reveals charges and treats doctors like grocers . When experience is weighed in money it makes the heart very sad. Best of luck mr shubhajit . But your attitude should change toward doctors . We are life savers and u talk with such audacity .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been visiting doctor for about two months now and I have done three root canal procedures. I am totally satisfied with the way the procedure was done. I was really scared and sceptic about Root canal but Dr.Priya very patiently took time n explained the procedure with a video. The procedure went on really smooth and I would say she is the only dentist I have felt like going back for a treatment. I am a hundred percent satisfied and I would highly recommend others too bcuz she is worth it.My siblings also have taken her treatment and were happy with the procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I've lots of teeth problems. Cavities, fillings, RCTs. So far I visited the clinic once for RCT and will be visiting soon again mam till the entire course of treatment.The first thing you notice about her is, she is so friendly and polite. She doesn't dig into what has happened and focuses more on what we can do to fix the issues.She explained the procedure and why what was required throughly. She didn't start any mindless treatment and only started after seeing my reports, so as to avoid any extra or not required work and money spending on my part.Most importantly this is the first time I got some positive assurance from a doctor that my severely decayed teeth can be restored. I highly recommend her.
Very friendly. Doctor explains everything so patiently *** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ******** Well equipped clinic and good suggestion of medicines

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Dental Fillings,Dental screening and prophylaxis,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
Dr. Priya explained in detail about my teeth condition, and also recommended tooth paste for sensitivity. Dr Priya on examining my teeth also identified one molar cavity and recommended tooth filing.
My teeth sensitivity was resolved by tooth cleaning and by using the prescribed tooth paste. Further my dental filing prevented further tooth decay and a possible future rooth canal.
Overall a very pleasant experience. Moreover Dr Priya  is very forthright in explaining the problem and resolving the matter.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I first went to see Dr. Priya in my third trimester of pregnancy. She explained how x ray can be risky for my baby and ask me to come after delivery. One tooth needed some filling too so she told me if it troubles more, I can come to see her for that. After a month, I called her if I can come for the filling but because the COVID cases were at rise she refused to see me then and asked me not to take risk by going out. And at that moment I felt so much gratitude for her.
 So my RCT started this month and to my surprise she didn't charge me any consultation fee saying that I paid in first visit. I really didn't expect that. The whole process went very smooth and I feel no trouble now.
 Dr. Priya is very polite and friendly. And the thing I like most about her is that she is very straightforward, gives right suggestions and is extremely helpful. I strongly recommend her to anyone with any dental issue.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Very skilled doctor,who perfectly identified  the problem of mine n did root canal followed by crown placement. 
Strongly recommend "The Dentist" clinic for any tooth related issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a wonderful experience with Dr. Priya,
She is the go to doctor for all the dental treatment. I had been  for teeth cleaning and gum laser treatment for the bone loss. She had been very caring with getting the best treatment after all the examination.The overall process was positive, and I would definitely recommend her to others for there dental treatment.

I was searching for good clinic and good Dentist for a while to get treatment for my mother and finally I founda good one "The Dentist". Dr Priya was very friendly and explains the issue clearly and her clinic is very much hygenic and got the good treatment ,even staffs are very helpful and friendly in nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Priya's dental clinic when my dental health was in bad condition. She took great care to analyse and treat my tooth and gum condition. The treatment was done with utmost attention and care. I was explained every single aspect before all the procedures. I feel greatly relieved now after the treatment as my dental health is restored.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My problem was understood immediately by Dr.Priya, and the treatment was explained very perfectly to me.
The consecutive appointments were also lined up accordingly to my convenience.
And the treatment got completed in no time, unlike the old times where I had to keep visiting the dentist multiple times.
Hence, I. Veryyy happy with the treatment and would really recommend her

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I have visited doctor priya dental clinic for dental check up when i was having a severe gum bleeding problem, which used to make me feel so bad while speaking with others. Once i went there i got treatment for gum bleeding. My problem reduced in 2 days as soon as the treatment was started. Felt so happy , hence i would suggest everyone

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr priya treated us well and explained us the problem we had with patience. 
Please do visit treatment is given with proper care.

I strongly recommend Dr. Priya for Dental challenges. 
She patiently listened to my challenges and recommended right treatment (root canal) along with clear explanation. 
Post treatment, I have no issues in that teeth. 
I thank Dr. Priya and team for their timely help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor Priya is very friendly and accommodating,she helped my throughout the process with great ease and comfort.I had a failed RCT so she made sure I was well informed about the process and helped me with all my queries.Would highly recommend her and the clinic.
Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: dr.priya ** * **** **** ****** ** ***** ** explaining the problem and working out the solutions across multiple sittings and making the procedure painless and always helpful in rescheduling visit times. have been having root canals since 2020 december..and 2nd set of work now in 2022september

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had tooth cavities which were causing severe tooth ache. The doctor suggested a root canal treatment for one of them and normal filling for the others. The root canal was painless and was completed in 3 seatings. It has been some days and I don't feel any pain or sensitivity now. Overall satisfied with the treatment and would recommend her to others too!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I have always found Dr Priya to be one who follows a consultative approach unlike the others in her line of profession who  are more prescriptive. She has patiently listened to my problem,  shared the Root cause and explained the line of treatment decipherable by a non medico patient like me. Rest assured, missing a follow up visit is ruled out as she/staff ensure to remind a forgetful patient like me. Keep up the noble work, Doc!

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr Priya deserves highest star for the way she treats ,I was kind of hesitant to go to dental doctors *** ***** *** ** **** **** ************* *** she treated very good for my gum disease now I have less dental problem with my gums , undoubtedly go for her counsel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fixed Partial Denture (FPD),Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: We came to Dr. Priya Mahimtura( The dentist, Electronic City) on 4th April 2021 for my 77 years old father’s multiple dental problems. We almost lost our hope that it can be solved, then dr. Priya handled from RC to fixing bridges and partial denture, and the result was 100% satisfactory. Friendly and highly recommended..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Experienced doctor , strongly recommending for others ! shorter waiting time , precise in medication advice , waiting room is very nicely designed with color chairs ,providing insight about tooth issues in the Tv and advice how to prevent in our daily life . Appreciated this clinic for sharing this information .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor explained the root canal treatment in detail and also showed a video of the treatment which made the whole procedure very clear to me. The ambience of the clinic was excellent* *** ****** ** **** ******* ** ***** **** I will recommend Dr Priya Mahimtura for all dental treatments.

tags: Wait time,
review:
Experience was pathetic. I booked the appointment over practo on Sunday at 9.30 am and it was confirmed. So went to the clinic. But the clinic itself was closed and told me that they will open by 10 am. But they opened at 10.30. I booked the appointment only because all other clinic was opening at 10 and only this was opening at 9.30.  

And after that she extracted the tooth and prescribed to do root canal for the other tooth. I agreed and went to clinic on time  according to the appointment. But she was not in the clinic and left before 1 hour. When I called her she asked me to wait for 10 min and made me to wait for 45 min. *** **** *** **** **** ***** ** ****
reply_text: Can u come out with ure name please. Cos we do not work on Sundays. If this really has happened.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was really a good experience while having my RCT done with Dr. Priya. I already had an experience with dental treatments in the past as well with several famous doctors across India, so that’s the reason I’m sharing my feedbacks today. Dr Priya treats all her patients with lot of care as if they are part of her own family. I had an issue where it was painful while getting the RCT Completed, she gave all her time to that. Called me up and gave her time on several sittings so that the pain subsides and I don’t feel much pain. It’s really a good gesture which is missing in the doctors nowadays who are just rushing behind money. Really appreciate. Looking forward to get my parents treated under her as well.
Doctor is not polite and patient friendly. At least she should check and listen. She should boost moral of patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Great Experience!! Specially Dental Implant and Root canal treatment was very smooth!! Priya madam was very helpful and approachable during the entire treatment!! Highly recommended!!

review: Very professional and helpful people. This is a very well maintained hygienic place. Dr. Priya is very pleasant and helped ease our anxiety. Checkup + X Ray + Consultation + Scaling took hardly 45 mins. Highly recommended !!!

review: After a accident for dental correction i had been to Dr. Priya's clinic. She suggested me the right process and completed dental correction so nicely that i am able to smile with confidence. Recently took my staff for a infected tooth extraction.. She makes the patient feel so comfortable and on top of all she does all the process at a very reasonable rate.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Priya is a very skilled professional and is very patient and soft spoken. She gives enough time for the patient to prepare themselves before any kind of treatment. She operates in and around hygienic environment with latest tools and equipments. *** ** ** ****** ** *** ******

She's a talented and quite an experienced doctor. We went for my sister's checkup and she had a tooth decay because if which her tooth was extracted and it pained badly sometimes. She could understand the pain isn't because of this but because of the other teeth coming up from the back from the upper jaw.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Priya is a very experienced. She explains the problem very clearly. 
My daughter suffered with mouth ulcers for a long time. 
Priya's treatment gave her immediate relief.
We have been visiting Priya for a long time. We are very happy and satisfied with her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor explains the problem in an understandable way. I have visited two dental clinics before visiting the Dr.Priya. They were suggesting some additional treatments.  But, Dr.Priya suggests only the required things. Hygiene. Everytime, new tools and gloves are used.  I haven't experienced any swelling/pain after the treatment. Now, I am happy without pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Did visit for wife's root canal and crowning.Happy with the service provided. She clearly explained what is the state of previous treatments and what she is gonna do and how good it is for the teeth based on current state. I am writing this review after 15 days of treatment, Problems are addressed very neatly.Definitely a good GO TO doctor in this surroundings. Thank you doctor.
